definition: lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway
memorial arch in honor of a chaste widow
lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom)/fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation/to want to have one's cake and eat it too
pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1
containing_words.word: 又想当婊子又想立牌坊

containing_words.word: 既要当婊子又要立牌坊

sentences.english: Red Palace gatehouse for the six-five Church architecture.
sentences.chinese: 红宫门楼为六柱五间牌坊式建筑。

sentences.english: The second yard, the ancient stone torii.
sentences.chinese: 二进院子里阔气古老的石牌坊。

sentences.english: Look at all the Indian names carved on the memorial arches in Picardy.
sentences.chinese: 看在皮卡牌坊上刻的所有印度的名字。

sentences.english: Church, in the dark hold of mosaic stone, stone carvings of flowers on the figures.
sentences.chinese: 牌坊柱下镶嵌抱鼓石，石板上有人物花卉雕刻。

sentences.english: Its opposite ring Shihfang for a four- poster three wooden arch.
sentences.chinese: 其对面的戒石坊为一座四柱三顶的木制牌坊。

sentences.english: The arch stands silent revealed a Shanfucun ancient cultural atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 屹立的牌坊无声的透露着山甫村久远的人文气息。

sentences.english: Lighting can focus on a gazebo, garden architectural feature, or archway.
sentences.chinese: 灯光能够专注于一个凉亭，园林的建筑特色，或牌坊。

sentences.english: Build chastity memorial arch to belie the truth of being a bitch.
sentences.chinese: 建一个贞节牌坊以掩盖她是女表子的实情。

sentences.english: The other name of Paifang Is Chinese Archway (Pailou), which is special type branch of Chinese ancient architecture.
sentences.chinese: 牌坊又名牌楼，是中国古代建筑中的一个特殊类别。

sentences.english: America is typical a whore wanting to pass off as a virgin.
sentences.chinese: 美国是又要做婊子又要立牌坊的那一种。

sentences.english: Very not easy walk to macau Paul's cathedral, must remember to take pictures souvenir.
sentences.chinese: 好不容易走到澳门大三巴牌坊，一定要记得拍照留念。

sentences.english: The final chapter, on the status quo of Bashu Paifang and protection were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最后一章，对巴蜀牌坊的现状与保护作了粗略探讨。

sentences.english: Zhaoqing, a tourist city with long Folk art history, is rich in colorful culture, frequent cultural exchange.
sentences.chinese: 旅游文化节的民族歌舞演出地点定在七星岩牌坊广场。

sentences.english: If the mountain West Road plate, can see the" tiny" memorial archway.
sentences.chinese: 如果由西盘路上山，可以看见“齐烟九点”的牌坊。

sentences.english: The torii is connected with the square and the platform in front of it is an altar for large scale fiesta.
sentences.chinese: 牌坊与广场相连，坊前平台为祖庙大型祭典之祭坛。

definition: memorial arch in honor of a chaste widow
a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
area above the lintel of a doorway
horizontal rectangular inscribed tablet hung over a door or on a wall/shallow round woven bamboo basket
variant of 匾額|匾额[bian3 e2]
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
